alert.note: Alert for Bergen (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 28 at 10:21AM EST until December 29 at 5:06AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in New Jersey... Saddle River near Lodi affecting Bergen County. For the Saddle River...including Lodi...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Saddle River near Lodi. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM EST Thursday the stage was 6.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 5.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:00 AM EST Thursday was 6.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 7.0 feet late this morning. It will then fall below flood stage late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 5.5 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 6.9 feet on 04/04/1987. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm EST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Saddle River Lodi 5.5 6.9 Thu 10 am ES 3.1 2.9 MSG &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon by 400 PM ESTthis evening at 1030 PM EST.
